title: g0tmilk Linux Privilege Escalation checklist
extract: Common privileges include viewing and editing files, or modifying system files. ... Privilege escalation is the act of exploiting a bug, design flaw or configuration oversight in an operating system or software application to gain elevated access to resources that are normally protected from an application or user.Feb 20, 2018
